title: 关于舰娘modR25的崩溃问题
author: 请无视我.......
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-5-14 20:43 编辑 

      
           不知道为什么，本来R23的可以正常使用，可是更新了R25后就会崩掉，连开始界面都看不到==




           以下是crash文件，谢谢


---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Why did you do that?

Time: 16-5-14 下午6:12
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.RuntimeException: A mod has attempted to assign BlockID com.lulan.shincolle.block.BasicBlockFluid@487d8b to the Fluid 'water' but this Fluid has already been linked to BlockID net.minecraft.block.BlockStaticLiquid@45ec3d. Configure your mods to prevent this from happening.

         好心人送你个蛋糕~~

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 还是我来解释一下好了...你的原因的确是来自舰娘mod，你游戏会崩溃是因为舰娘mod里面的一种液体和原版的“水方块”拥有相同的ID导致冲突，其实你只需要修改舰娘mod这个液体（叫做BasicBlockFluid@487d8b）的ID就可以运行了

replies.author: 熊镔
replies.txt_content:
mod加载过程中的错误
shincolle{1.7.10.rv25} [Shinkeiseikan Collection] (ShinColle-1.7.10.rv25 朝倉音姬 簡化修正版.jar) 出了问题
更新或卸载

replies.author: 请无视我.......
replies.txt_content:
熊镔 发表于 2016-5-14 18:18
mod加载过程中的错误
shincolle{1.7.10.rv25} [Shinkeiseikan Collection] (ShinColle-1.7.10.rv25 朝倉音 ...
果然很快，然而这是最新版
不过我也不想卸载嘛，毕竟感情挺深的==
总之，谢谢==
